sceneTransition.description:
Zhib aims at an enemy and throws a knife. If the knife hits, the
	target is executed but it can be dodged. Zhib only has one knife,
	but he can pick it up after throwing them.
	The dodge chances are

Zhib throws a device that alerts and attracts nearby enemies for
	… seconds. After this time has passed, Zhib can pick up the
	device and use it again when it recharges.
	Cooldown:

Zhib targets an enemy and executes him. If there is another enemy
	inside a close range, he will slash through the first one onto
	the second one, executing him as well. This chain kill extends to
	a maximum of … enemies.
	Cooldown:
	Spice Cost:

Nerala aims at an enemy and fires a dart from her wrist that
	makes enemies drowsy for … seconds. Drowsy enemies detect players
	slower.
	Cooldown:

Nerala deploys a device that releases smoke in a given area
	during … seconds, making her invisible to the eyes of enemies
	while inside it. The smoke bomb only has … charges.

Nerala deploys a minuscule machine that she can control from afar
	during … seconds. This machine can execute enemies and is
	invisible to their eyes, but can still be heard. The machine will
	be destroyed if it’s detected by an enemy, it flies out of a
	given range, it kills … enemies or the batteries run out.
	Cooldown:
	Spice Cost:

Omozra points at an ally or himself, prompting Sadiq to emerge
	from the sand and spit on them, healing … hp points.
	Cooldown:

Omozra targets an enemy, commanding Sadiq to emerge from the sand
	and eat them. Sadly, Sadiq will also eat any spice that the enemy
	might carry.
	Cooldown:

Omozra points at an ally, prompting Sadiq to emerge from the sand
	and partly swallow them. While the ally is inside Sadiq, Omozra
	can move, but not cast any other abilities. Then, Omozra points
	at a desired spot inside a given range and Sadiq pops up and
	regurgitates the ally before disappearing under the sand again.
	This ability can’t be casted on Omozra himself.
	Cooldown:
	Spice Cost
